familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $100,001 - $1,000,000 in Rent or Royalties income from FLORHAM PARK REALTY ASSOCIATES, LLC (Commercial Real Estate in Florham Park, NJ) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
